lifecycleMethods.name: preLoad
lifecycleMethods.description: Called before setup to preload configs asynchronously. Returns a CompletableFuture that completes when all configs are loaded.

lifecycleMethods.name: setup
lifecycleMethods.description: Called during plugin initialization phase. Override to register commands, events, assets, and components. Empty by default.

lifecycleMethods.name: start
lifecycleMethods.description: Called after setup to enable the plugin. Override to perform any start-up logic after all plugins are set up. Empty by default.

lifecycleMethods.name: shutdown
lifecycleMethods.description: Called when plugin is shutting down. Override to perform cleanup before registries are cleaned up. Empty by default.

states.name: NONE
states.description: Initial state before any lifecycle method is called

states.name: DISABLED
states.description: Plugin is disabled or failed to initialize

fields.name: LoadBefore
fields.description: Plugins that should load after this one

fields.name: DisabledByDefault
fields.description: Whether plugin is disabled by default

fields.name: IncludesAssetPack
fields.description: Whether plugin includes an asset pack

manifestFormat.codeSnippet:
public static final Codec<PluginManifest> CODEC = BUILDER.append(
      new KeyedCodec<>("Group", Codec.STRING), (manifest, o) -> manifest.group = o, manifest -> manifest.group
   )
   .add()
   .<String>append(new KeyedCodec<>("Name", Codec.STRING), (manifest, o) -> manifest.name = o, manifest -> manifest.name)
   .addValidator(Validators.nonNull())
   .add()
   .append(new KeyedCodec<>("Version", Semver.CODEC), (manifest, o) -> manifest.version = o, manifest -> manifest.version)
   .add()

authorInfo.codeSnippet:
public static final Codec<AuthorInfo> CODEC = BuilderCodec.builder(AuthorInfo.class, AuthorInfo::new)
   .append(new KeyedCodec<>("Name", Codec.STRING), (authorInfo, s) -> authorInfo.name = s, authorInfo -> authorInfo.name)
   .add()
   .append(new KeyedCodec<>("Email", Codec.STRING), (authorInfo, s) -> authorInfo.email = s, authorInfo -> authorInfo.email)
   .add()
   .append(new KeyedCodec<>("Url", Codec.STRING), (authorInfo, s) -> authorInfo.url = s, authorInfo -> authorInfo.url)
   .add()
   .build();

methods.name: setup
methods.description: Initializes all plugins, loads from directories and classpath, validates dependencies

methods.name: start
methods.description: Starts all set up plugins, transitions them to ENABLED state

methods.name: shutdown
methods.description: Shuts down all enabled plugins in reverse order

methods.name: getPlugins
methods.description: Returns a list of all loaded plugins

methods.name: getPlugin
methods.description: Gets a plugin by its identifier

methods.name: load
methods.description: Dynamically loads a plugin by identifier

methods.name: register
methods.signature: register(Class<? super EventType> eventClass, Consumer<EventType> consumer)
methods.description: Register an event listener with default priority

methods.name: register
methods.signature: register(EventPriority priority, Class<? super EventType> eventClass, Consumer<EventType> consumer)
methods.description: Register an event listener with specified priority

methods.name: register
methods.signature: register(Class<? super EventType> eventClass, KeyType key, Consumer<EventType> consumer)

methods.name: registerGlobal
methods.signature: registerGlobal(Class<? super EventType> eventClass, Consumer<EventType> consumer)
methods.description: Register a global event listener that receives all events of the type

methods.name: registerAsync
methods.signature: registerAsync(Class<? super EventType> eventClass, Function<CompletableFuture<EventType>, CompletableFuture<EventType>> function)

methods.name: registerCommand
methods.description: Registers a command with the server's command manager

pluginClassLoader.description: Custom class loader for plugins that supports loading from JAR files and cross-plugin class access

pluginLoadingProcess.description: Plugin loading follows a multi-phase process

phases.name: Discovery
phases.description: Plugins are discovered from: core plugins, builtin directory, classpath (manifest.json/manifests.json), mods directory

phases.name: Dependency Validation
phases.description: Dependencies are validated against loaded plugins and server version requirements

phases.name: Load Order Calculation
phases.description: Plugins are sorted based on dependencies and LoadBefore declarations

phases.name: Instantiation
phases.description: Main class is loaded via reflection, constructor taking JavaPluginInit is invoked

phases.name: PreLoad
phases.description: preLoad() is called to load configs asynchronously

phases.name: Setup
phases.description: setup() is called to register commands, events, assets, etc.

phases.name: Start
phases.description: start() is called after all plugins are set up

builtinPluginExamples.name: BlockSpawnerPlugin
builtinPluginExamples.purpose: Handles block spawner mechanics - spawns blocks based on configured spawner tables

builtinPluginExamples.name: BlockTickPlugin
builtinPluginExamples.purpose: Manages block ticking procedures for block growth and state changes

builtinPluginExamples.name: BlockPhysicsPlugin
builtinPluginExamples.purpose: Handles block physics simulation and prefab validation

builtinPluginExamples.name: HytaleGenerator
builtinPluginExamples.purpose: Provides world generation using biome maps, terrain generation, and prop placement

builtinPluginExamples.name: AssetEditorPlugin
builtinPluginExamples.purpose: Provides in-game asset editing capabilities for development

constructorRequirement.description: Plugins must have a constructor that takes JavaPluginInit as the only parameter
